languages.text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Лорд-капитану же последующие несколько ночей снились беспокойные сны о странных существах, наблюдающих за экспедицией по другую сторону зеркальных гор.

traits.locale_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Лорд-капитану же последующие несколько ночей снились беспокойные сны о странных существах, наблюдающих за экспедицией по другую сторону зеркальных гор.

languages.text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.
languages.original_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Лорд-капитану же последующие несколько ночей снились беспокойные сны о странных существах, наблюдающих за экспедицией по другую сторону зеркальных гор.

traits.locale_text: The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers, who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers, who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers, who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

languages.text: 这次旅行很平静，给船上的军官留下了愉快的印象，他们在之后的几个星期里一直在讨论这件事情。至于领主舰长，{mf|他的|她的}梦中时常会出现奇怪的生物，在镜山的另一侧注视着他们的远征。
languages.original_text: The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers, who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

traits.locale_text: 这次旅行很平静，给船上的军官留下了愉快的印象，他们在之后的几个星期里一直在讨论这件事情。至于领主舰长，{mf|他的|她的}梦中时常会出现奇怪的生物，在镜山的另一侧注视着他们的远征。

languages.text: 旅は穏やかに進み、士官たちに爽やかな印象を残した。彼らは、その後何週間もそのことについて語り合った。ロード・キャプテンはというと、{mf|彼|彼女}は、鏡の山の向こう側から探検隊を監視する奇妙な生き物から目を離すことができずにいた。
languages.original_text: The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers, who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

traits.locale_text: 旅は穏やかに進み、士官たちに爽やかな印象を残した。彼らは、その後何週間もそのことについて語り合った。ロード・キャプテンはというと、{mf|彼|彼女}は、鏡の山の向こう側から探検隊を監視する奇妙な生き物から目を離すことができずにいた。

languages.text: El viaje fue tranquilo y dejó una grata impresión en los oficiales de la nave, que siguieron comentándolo durante semanas. En cuanto {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán, sus sueños estaban atormentados por extrañas criaturas que observaban la expedición desde el otro lado de las montañas espejo.
languages.original_text: The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers, who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

traits.locale_text: El viaje fue tranquilo y dejó una grata impresión en los oficiales de la nave, que siguieron comentándolo durante semanas. En cuanto {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán, sus sueños estaban atormentados por extrañas criaturas que observaban la expedición desde el otro lado de las montañas espejo.

languages.text: Die Reise verlief friedlich und hinterließ bei den Offizieren des Schiffs bleibenden Eindruck. Sie sprachen noch Wochen später davon. Was den Lord Captain angeht, dessen Träume wurden von merkwürdigen Kreaturen heimgesucht, die die Expedition von der anderen Seite von Spiegelbergen beobachteten.
languages.original_text: The trip was peaceful and left a pleasant impression on the ship's officers, who kept discussing it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

traits.locale_text: Die Reise verlief friedlich und hinterließ bei den Offizieren des Schiffs bleibenden Eindruck. Sie sprachen noch Wochen später davon. Was den Lord Captain angeht, dessen Träume wurden von merkwürdigen Kreaturen heimgesucht, die die Expedition von der anderen Seite von Spiegelbergen beobachteten.

languages.text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Quant {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, ses rêves sont hantés par les étranges créatures qui ont suivi des yeux l'expédition depuis le versant opposé des montagnes-miroirs.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. As for Lord-Captain, {mf|his|her} dreams were haunted by strange creatures that watched the expedition from the other side of the mirror mountains.

traits.locale_text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Quant {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, ses rêves sont hantés par les étranges créatures qui ont suivi des yeux l'expédition depuis le versant opposé des montagnes-miroirs.
